main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Dayton, Ohio in 1954, including saucer-shaped objects hovering and accelerating out of sight, as well as clear and blurred yellow objects disappearing by becoming smaller and fading. Witnesses reported no sound from the objects.
interesting points: The saucer-shaped object was estimated to be approximately 20 feet in diameter and accelerated rapidly out of sight with no sound.
A solid, clear, yellow and blurred object was observed and it disappeared by becoming smaller and fading.
The witness reported that the edges of the object were fuzzy or blurred.
Various forms used by the U.S. Air Force, such as record cards and technical information sheets, were utilized to gather information about the unidentified aerial phenomena.
Detailed questionnaires included drawings of the objects, estimations of size and brightness, and descriptions of the observation location and weather conditions.
sighted object: saucer-shaped and clear, blurred yellow objects
